time: must be a valid time, for example 12:00 or 12pm

prisonNumber: Enter a prison number in the correct format

move_conflict.heading: This move cannot be created
move_conflict.heading_review: This move cannot be requested for this date
move_conflict.message: A move already exists for {{name}} to {{location}} on {{date}}.
move_conflict.message_update: A move already exists for {{name}} on {{date}}.
move_conflict.instructions: If you still need to move this person try changing the date or the destination.
move_conflict.instructions_review: If you still need to move this person try changing the date.

move_not_supported.heading: {{-name}} cannot be moved using this service
move_not_supported.message: As this person is a Category {{category}} prisoner, they cannot be moved using this service.

assign_conflict.heading: This person cannot be added to this allocation
assign_conflict.message: A move already exists for {{name}} to {{location}} on {{date}}.

assign_needs_special_vehicle.heading: This person cannot be added to this allocation
assign_needs_special_vehicle.message: {{name}} needs a special vehicle and cannot be part of an allocation move.
assign_needs_special_vehicle.instructions: Add a different person or create a single request for {{name}} if they still need to move.

unassign_ineligible.heading: This person cannot be removed from this allocation
unassign_ineligible.message: A person cannot be removed once the move is in transit or completed.
